content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
No new structures have been successfully placed by the agent. The following components were referenced during operations, but none resulted in a confirmed placement on the map:
 
### Lab Supply Attempt at Position(0.5, 2.5)
• Intended as the target for supplying Automation Science Packs, this Lab was repeatedly looked for, attempted to be placed, and crafted. All attempts failed due to missing inventory and insufficient resources, so no Lab structure is present.

### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(5.0, 5.0)
• An existing furnace was retrieved and used to smelt iron ore into additional iron plates. This structure enabled the smelting process needed to boost iron-plate inventory.

### Copper Smelting Furnace at Position(-27.0, -60.0)
• An existing copper furnace was retrieved to process copper ore into copper plates, supporting the supply chain needed for subsequent production steps.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• get_entities API Misuse
  – Avoid passing unsupported keyword arguments (e.g. “radius”) or extra positional arguments. Always verify the function’s signature before invocation.

• Lab Placement and Retrieval Failures
  – Before attempting placement, confirm that the required Lab is available in the inventory.
  – When retrieving entities, check for a None result before iterating, to prevent type errors.

• Lab Crafting Ingredient Shortages
  – Ensure that all sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are available in sufficient quantities.
  – Review the entire crafting chain and prerequisites (e.g. smelting steps for iron plates and copper plates) to avoid missing ingredient errors.
  – Confirm the exact ingredient counts required by the recipe before initiating a Lab craft attempt.

No utility functions were defined by the agent in these steps.
